mapper.select: select * from tb_wiki where section=#{section} and deleteat=0 order by registerdate asc

select a.*, b.username from tb_wiki_history a left outer join tb_users b on a.userno = b.userno where wikino = #{wikino}
order by updatedate desc
select count(*) from public.tb_questions where tagno like '%' || #{tagno} || '%'
mapper.update: update tb_wiki set title = #{title}, contents = #{contents}, updatedate = now() where wikino = #{wikino}
update tb_wiki set deleteat = 1, updatedate = now() where wikino = #{wikino}
mapper.select: select * from tb_wiki where section = #{section} and deleteat=0 and userno in ( select cast(userno as TEXT) from tb_users_detail where enterpriseno = #{userno} ) order by registerdate desc limit 4
select count(*) from tb_wiki where section = #{section} and deleteat=0 and userno in ( select cast(userno as TEXT) from tb_users_detail where enterpriseno = #{userno} )
